gw.api.webservice.addressbook.contactapi

Class ABContactSearchSpecWithoutPaging

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.webservice.addressbook.contactapi.ABContactSearchSpecWithoutPaging
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GWRemotable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ABContactSearchSpec

    public class ABContactSearchSpecWithoutPaging
extends Object
implements GWRemotable
    Specifies various parameters to control search. Doesn't not include parameters related to paging and sorting. Pebbles handles that stuff for the UI separately.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean IncludePendingCreates
      Determines whether to include the pending creates in the search result.
      ABContactSubtypeFilter SubtypeFilter
      Specifies the subtypes to filter out. null can be used to specify that no filtering is needed.
      ABContactTagMatcher TagMatcher
      the matcher for restricting tags
      boolean WideSearch
      Determines whether to search a wider range of contacts. If true falls back to {@link com.guidewire.ab.domain.addressbook.ABCompany}, {@link com.guidewire.ab.domain.addressbook.ABPerson} and {@link com.guidewire.ab.domain.addressbook.ABPlace} instead of chosing specific search strategies for each subtype.

      • WideSearch

        boolean WideSearch
        Determines whether to search a wider range of contacts. If true falls back to {@link com.guidewire.ab.domain.addressbook.ABCompany}, {@link com.guidewire.ab.domain.addressbook.ABPerson} and {@link com.guidewire.ab.domain.addressbook.ABPlace} instead of chosing specific search strategies for each subtype.

      • setIncludePendingCreates

        void setIncludePendingCreates(boolean includePendingCreates)
        Parameters:
        includePendingCreates - Determines whether to include the pending creates in the search result.

      • setSubtypeFilter

        void setSubtypeFilter(ABContactSubtypeFilter subtypeFilter)
        Parameters:
        subtypeFilter - Specifies the subtypes to filter out. null can be used to specify that no filtering is needed.

      • setTagMatcher

        void setTagMatcher(ABContactTagMatcher tagMatcher)
        Parameters:
        tagMatcher - Specifies the tags to match. null or an empty matcher will match on any tag.

      • setWideSearch

        void setWideSearch(boolean wideSearch)
        Parameters:
        wideSearch - Whether to search a wider range of contacts. If true falls back to {@link com.guidewire.ab.domain.addressbook.ABCompany}, {@link com.guidewire.ab.domain.addressbook.ABPerson} and {@link com.guidewire.ab.domain.addressbook.ABPlace} instead of chosing specific search strategies for each subtype.
